activities.name: send email update for Product_Insight script

body.value:
{
 "title":"PIPELINE RUN FOR Product_Insight_script FAILED",
 "color":"RED",
 "message":"Debug the Product_Insight_script and run the Pipeline again",
 "dataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
 "pipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
 "pipelineRunId":"@{pipeline().RunId}",
 "time":"@{utcnow()}"
}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DELETE FROM pi_pivot where Month = (SELECT DATENAME(month,GETDATE())) and Year = (SELECT YEAR(GETDATE()));
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM pi_pivot;

DELETE FROM pi_trends where Month = (SELECT DATENAME(month,GETDATE())) and Year = (SELECT YEAR(GETDATE()));
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM pi_trends;

DELETE FROM pi_lscape where Month = (SELECT DATENAME(month,GETDATE())) and Year = (SELECT YEAR(GETDATE()));
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM pi_lscape;
